name: Block With a Gun
description:
This game was made over the course of about three weeks as a fun summer project.  Though it's my first ever game, and it's still a bit rough and not the most graphically pleasing, I hope you are still able to enjoy it! If there's a great  deal of interest in the game, then I may use some free time to add some features and fixes to improve it, so a genuine comment or two about that would be very appreciated.

In this game you take on the role of Red Square as he tries to... well I'm not sure exactly, but it definitely involves guns, triangles, slow motion, and a final boss fight. Use "S" and "D" to move left and right and "W" to jump. (Pro tip: Holding a direction and jumping lets you chain wall jumps when in contact with a surface.) Your trusty pistol follows your mouse and shoots on a left click. Don't forget to press space to slow down time to pull off hard jumps, dodge bullets, or even shoot bullets with your own.

Also, a big thanks to the artists that made the music in this game:

Main Menu Theme - "Submersible.mp3" by  Xylo-Ziko 

Level 1 Theme -  "Run" by Andrew Codeman

Level 2 Theme - "Untitled" by Samuel Rose

Level 3 Theme - "Neon Lights" by Nirikin
